description: Navigate to the website and register a new user with username as "User" + N, where N is timestamp. use password as "pwd"

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Click on the 'Register' or 'create an account'Â button to open the registration form
Generate a unique username by concatenating 'User' with the current timestamp
Locate the username input field and enter the generated unique username
Locate the password input field and enter 'pwd'
Submit the registration form
Verify that the user lands back to the login page.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Register a new user on website

description:
Navigate to the website and use the following credentials to login. 
username: test_user_name, password: test_password.

Verify user successfully logged in; logged in users see a banner image.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter the username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' into the login form fields
Submit the login form by clicking the login button
Verify that the banner image is displayed to confirm successful login
Take a screenshot of the completed page to capture the logged in state with the banner image

description:
Navigate to the website and enter following credentials in the login page.

username: invalid_user
password: pwd

Validate that the user is unable to login and gets an appropriate failure message.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'invalid_user' and password 'pwd' into the respective fields on the login page
Click the login button to attempt authentication
Verify that an appropriate failure message is displayed indicating unsuccessful login
Take a screenshot of the page to document the failed login state

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Attempt login and validate failure message

description: Test form validation on the login page by attempting to submit the form with various invalid inputs including empty fields, whitespace-only inputs, and verify that appropriate validation behavior occurs. Check that the form prevents submission with empty username, empty password, and handles whitespace inputs properly.

steps.stepDescription: Open the browser and navigate to the login page at http://localhost:3005/login.
Verify that the login page loads correctly and that the input fields for username and password are visible.
Attempt to submit the login form without entering any data in the username or password fields.
Check that the form validation prevents submission and displays error messages for the empty username and password fields.
Enter whitespace-only values in the username field while leaving the password field empty, and then attempt to submit the form.
Verify that the form correctly identifies the whitespace-only input as invalid and shows appropriate validation errors.
Take a screenshot of the final state of the login page to confirm that all validation messages are displayed as expected.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Validate login form with invalid inputs
